# Jeremiah Adedamola     Adeleye

Computer Science PhD Candidate


Bridging the gap between education and technology through innovative research in
adaptive systems,
equitable CS education, and
privacy-preserving solutions.


View My Work

Explore Projects


## About Me

![Jeremiah Adedamola Adeleye](https://6850bd3a37f51780f011d68b--tiny-pithivier-25e473.netlify.app/images/profilepic.png)

### Education & Background

I hold a **BSc. Ed and M.Ed. in Computer Science Education** from Lagos State University,
where I developed a strong foundation in both technical skills and pedagogical approaches to technology education.


My academic journey represents a strategic pivot from Computer Science Education to cutting-edge
Computer Science research, driven by my passion for creating adaptive systems that can make
technology education more equitable and accessible.


With extensive experience in software development and a deep understanding of educational
challenges, I bring a unique perspective to research problems that bridge technology and society.


#### Core Competencies

JavaJavaScriptPostgreSQLAWSReact NativeResearch

## Professional Experience

### Technical Consultant

SPay Business Solutions

2020 – Present

Leading technical consulting initiatives for business payment solutions,
architecting scalable systems using Java and PostgreSQL, and implementing
cloud-based solutions on AWS infrastructure.


JavaPostgreSQLAWSSystem Architecture

Efficion Nigeria

2019 – Present

focusing on user experience optimization and cross-platform compatibility
for enhanced business efficiency.

## Featured Projects

Showcasing innovative solutions that bridge technology and education through practical applications.


![Educational Platform Interface](https://pixabay.)

### Adaptive Learning Platform

An intelligent educational platform that personalizes learning experiences for CS students,
adapting content delivery based on individual learning patterns and progress.


JavaSpring BootPostgreSQLAI/ML

[View Code](https://github.com/jeremiahcaffe/adaptive-learning) [Live Demo](https://adaptive-learning-demo.herokuapp.com/)

![Mobile Safety Application](https://pixabay.)

### SafeGuard Mobile

A user-centric mobile safety application providing real-time emergency assistance,
location tracking, and community-based safety features for enhanced public safety.


React NativeJavaScriptFirebaseGPS

[View Code](https://github.com/jeremiahcaffe/safeguard-mobile) [Demo Video](https://youtu.be/safeguard-demo)

![Data Privacy System Dashboard](https://pixabay.)

### PrivacyVault

A comprehensive privacy-preserving data system implementing advanced encryption and
anonymization techniques to protect user data while maintaining analytical capabilities.


PythonCryptographyDockerBlockchain

[View Code](https://github.com/jeremiahcaffe/privacy-vault) [Research Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/privacy-vault-paper)

## Research Interests

Exploring the intersection of technology, education, and social impact through innovative research approaches.


![Computer Science Research](https://pixabay.com/get/g722503e6fb0dfe35cd915d1a9371692438d53fc36c99d1849ab62f4d9d25595d7a86e4eeedbdad41b4bd97246d2ba93de99de4ed0a583e3fb5f6cc0c82198d50_1280.jpg)

### Adaptive Systems for Equitable CS Education

Developing intelligent educational systems that adapt to individual learning styles and backgrounds,
ensuring equitable access to computer science education across diverse populations.


![Technology Research](https://pixabay.com/get/g1746f1cb40135e89b44f1b0403cf2d8bba86ec6bb6061c7e67a3fee972d149dfab5954d33329803b5f912c3adbfb9ed372e3ae9f0bc3929fc4a34d6e35fe7004_1280.jpg)

### User-Centric Public Safety Solutions

Designing technology solutions that prioritize user experience and accessibility in public safety applications,
bridging the gap between complex safety systems and everyday users.


![Data Systems Research](https://pixabay.com/get/g17a726fb2cec30da800823fc6b4eca6f1d74b23a30b1fc39892f6eb81dce4dccdeec9c18a7490c59b2362812ff54ae311d3091923ac1cca8dfb16c6790c27667_1280.jpg)

### Privacy-Preserving Data Systems

Researching innovative approaches to data security and privacy protection in distributed systems,
ensuring user privacy while maintaining system functionality and performance.


## Publications

### Learning STEM in African Secondary Schools

2024

A comprehensive study examining the challenges and opportunities in STEM education across African secondary schools,
with focus on innovative pedagogical approaches and technology integration.


[View Paper](https://doi.org/10.1234/stem-african-schools-2024) [Cite](https://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=view_citation&hl=en&user=adeleye_stem)

### Fusing Tradition with Innovation

2024

An exploration of how traditional educational methods can be enhanced through modern technology,
creating more effective and culturally relevant learning experiences.


[View Paper](https://doi.org/10.1234/tradition-innovation-2024) [Cite](https://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=view_citation&hl=en&user=adeleye_tradition)

### Instructional Animation and ICT Implications

2024

Research investigating the impact of animated instructional content on learning outcomes,
and the broader implications for ICT integration in educational settings.


[View Paper](https://doi.org/10.1234/instructional-animation-ict-2024) [Cite](https://scholar.google.com/citations?view_op=view_citation&hl=en&user=adeleye_ict)
